attributes.action: Stop putting immigrants to the top of Housing list and being given properties before British citizens!!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Working families/single parents on low incomes who can't afford to private rent or Buy. We are put to the bottom of Council housing lists or put on low bands which mean we will never be housed or put as a priority!
Please sign the petition to try and make a stop to this!!!
